title: Sprint 05: Database & Eloquent Foundation
description: Standardizing data access, schema management, and ORM mastery.
items: 01- Database Migrations: Creating tables, modifiers, indexes, foreign keys, rolling back
02- Seeding & Factories: Model factories, legacy factories, states, sequences, seeding flow
03- Query Builder: DB facade, selects, joins, unions, having, raw expressions (DB::raw)
04- Eloquent Models: Active Record pattern, table mapping, primary keys, timestamps
06- Basic Relationships: hasOne, belongsTo, hasMany (One-to-One, One-to-Many)
07- Advanced Relationships: belongsToMany (Pivot tables), hasOneThrough, hasManyThrough
08- Polymorphic Relationships: morphOne, morphMany, morphTo structure, One-of-Many
09- Eager Loading: N+1 problem, with(), lazy eager loading (load()), counting related
10- Accessors & Mutators: get/setAttribute mechanics, Attribute class (PHP 8.1)
11- Soft Deletes: Trait usage, restoring, force deleting, querying trashed items
12- Eloquent Events: creating, updated, deleting hooks, Observer classes setup
13- Global Scopes: Writing and applying global query constraints (e.g. Multi-tenancy)
14- Local Scopes: Reusable query logic (scopeActive), dynamic scopes parameters
15- Collections: The Collection class power, transforming model results, Higher order msg
